author: KdGaming0
name: ModrinthNotifier
description: A comprehensive cog that monitors Modrinth projects (mods, modpacks, resource packs, shaders) for updates and sends rich notifications to Discord channels. Features include server-wide monitoring, personal watchlists, role pinging, and intelligent polling.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores project IDs, version information, and notification preferences. No personal user data is collected beyond Discord user IDs for watchlist management.
